title: Leamington Spa
name: 8 Clarendon Crescent
directions: just a 3 minute walk off the Upper Parade

reviews.content: I highly recommend this hotel.they have an awesome beach w no waves perfect to float all day long.the service is awesome the drinks are the best ever(very expensive )but good.I think this is my new favorite place to go.they have lots of activities .the grounds are so well kept.can't wait to go back.
reviews.author: Timmothy Bechtelar

description: This is a lovely B&B where guests are warmly welcomed by Christine and David. Each room has an ensuite bathroom and the breakfasts will keep you going through the day.
